channel.title: Making bank boots and other objects
channel.description: how to i place a object like a bank booth or a haybail or something. i have no idea how, thanks

item.title: Making bank boots and other objects
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Go to client.java

Hit CTRL+F Search for makeglobalobject

Search until you see something like: makeGlobalObject(X-COORDINATE, Y-COORDINATE, OBJECT ID, -2, 10); // BANK

Bank ID = 6084

The -2 represents the direction. 0 = North, -1 = East, -2 = South, -3 = West.

Read full topic
item.source: Making bank boots and other objects

item.title: Making bank boots and other objects
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

client.java scroll down till u see addglobalobject or summin like dat

then look at the codes and here is what they mean

copy one and change these

Addglobalobject(Xcoord, Ycoord, ObjectId, What direction it faces, 10;

there is your basic global object code, for the directions ask someone the numbers, i forgot
